channel.title: Comments on: Why my Internet nickname is gnobal

item.title: By: xtreeq
item.dc:creator: xtreeq
item.description: You know I just had to... http://www.satlan.co.il/ You can buy all the stuff you need :) including the "gnob".
item.content:encoded:
You know I just had to…
http://www.satlan.co.il/
You can buy all the stuff you need :) including the “gnob”.

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description:
Hypothetically speaking, I think that if you smoked pot it would have made you very unique. Since you are not drinking alcohol, smoking would have made you one of the few people that do smoke pot but don't drink (I don't know of any).
In addition, many smokers' clich?©s could have been sound much cooler if said by you. For example, 'don't drink and drive, smoke and fly'.
All hypothetically speaking...
item.content:encoded:
Hypothetically speaking, I think that if you smoked pot it would have made you very unique. Since you are not drinking alcohol, smoking would have made you one of the few people that do smoke pot but don’t drink (I don’t know of any).

In addition, many smokers’ clich?©s could have been sound much cooler if said by you. For example, ‘don’t drink and drive, smoke and fly’.

All hypothetically speaking…

item.content:encoded:
